The 2025 season is Viking's 7th consecutive year in the Eliteserien, and their 75th season in the top flight of Norwegian football. The club is participating in the 2025 Eliteserien, 2025 Norwegian Football Cup and the 2025–26 UEFA Conference League. It is the club's fifth season with Bjarte Lunde Aarsheim and Morten Jensen as managers.
